3: Not that we don't trust Watanabe, Commandant, but you should at the very least notify us before you travel to Forsaken territory by yourself...
Pardon me, Commandant, but that was really unwise.
Hmph. Going there all by yourself without bringing anyone of us...
This call would have been your obituary just a few months ago!

4: Hey, hey, who's the commandant here?

3: We'll be going immediately, Commandant! Please stay somewhere safe in the meantime!
We have to get to Commandant before Oasis retracts its dome.

2: Watanabe will keep Oasis safe, I'm sure.
4: I know I can count on my squad!

3: Doesn't matter how Oasis react—your safety is still our responsibility, Commandant.
I've located Commandant's location... Massive Corrupted activity sighted in the area!
Let's go help the Forsaken for Commandant's sake.
But... what should we say if the people up top ask about it?

4: Relax. I'm the best at doing review reports.

3: Monitor Corrupted signals at all times. Send reinforcement to A-1. Stay in position, C-3.
